Title: Authorizes certain institutions for instruction of the deaf and blind to retain funds in excess of their allowable and reimbursable costs incurred for services and programs to students appointed
Summary: Authorizes certain institutions for instruction of the deaf and blind to retain funds in excess of their allowable and reimbursable costs incurred for services and programs to students appointed.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing certain institutions for instruction of the deaf and blind to retain funds in excess of their allowable and reimbursable costs incurred for services and programs to students appointed
